Posts.Content: littlewing78 wrote: I had a surgical milk duct biopsy last Wednesday through my nipple. I took off steri-strips yesterday. I have a ton of external and internal itching, which I hope is a sign of healing? Also I noticed yesterday a pink ring around the nipple. It looks inflammed. However, there is no swelling, no pus and i have no fever. Which are all signs of infection. Is pinkness around the incision normal? Thans Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Surgical site inflammed. Your experience? littlewing78 exercise_guru
